caption.p: Histograms of species richness change in agricultural areas of North America based on three dispersal assumptions; ( a) unlimited dispersal, ( b) high dispersal and ( c) no dispersal for all 30 modeled bumblebee species. The Y axis represents the percentage of all North American agricultural areas based on the HYDE (2016) land use dataset. The X axis corresponds to species richness changes (unit: number of species).
